item.title: About
item.description: Thanks for visiting my website! My name is Melissa Jay, and I am a fourth-year PhD Candidate in Biostatistics at the University of Iowa. I am working with Dr. Jacob Oleson on my dissertation research, which focuses on statistical methods for spatio-temporal modeling of cancer risk. We are developing methods for addressing zero inflation in the estimation of age-adjusted rates and methods for performing Bayesian mediation analyses with spatial datasets.
